name: Unlearn Your Jump
description:
It is based on themes Jump gone wrong and Unlearn

There is a bug which teleports you to start if you go if go too right. So better be aware

If the  platform tile you are standing falls you will be in lava in a second.

In this game you have to bring all the boxes back to the wooden platform  and the platform which are above the lava fall randomly i.e if you walk safely onto a platform it may fall the next time when you are walking on it as you have to unlearn what is correct and what not.

MY Discord name is Mineranger
